response.value:
Introduction

The aim of the report is to compare the two modes of transportation,bike and train.

Most popular transport

One of the most transport is bike.First,bike is a kind of green transportation,we choose bike is good for environment,it can save energy and reduce emissions.Second,cycling more is food for our health,we need to exercise more.Finally,bike is a cheap way to travel, and now many cities have free shared bikes,which can help us save money.

On the other hand,because of the construction of our city ,we have no safe place for bikes,this will cause us to lose our bikes.And cycling is very slow which may cause us to be late for school,time is precious to students.and more importantly,when the weather is rain,the floor will be dirty,so we must change our clothes after cycling

Second most popular transport

The second most popular means of transportation is train.As a kind of public transport, train is also good for environment,and train travel faster than bikes.With the development of our city,the stations are constructed more,most of the stations are near our home or school.

However,the train travel usually comes with expensive tickets,if we travel by train everyday,it will be a big expense.Besides this,train travel has lots of uncertainty,the train sometimes will late or cancelled.And when we meet rush hour,it will be crowded.

Recommendations

For bike:government should offer more safe place for bike parking

And school should change rooms for students

And the government should build bike roads ,allow students to cycle on special roads

For train:To avoid the rush school should start lessons later,students will not be crowded on the train

The government should afford the expensive tickets for students
